answer: "Aviate, navigate, communicate" reminds us what is most important and how to prioritize our responsibilities when flying.  Fly the airplane first and foremost.  Navigate when you can. Communicate when you need help. In an emergency or dangerous situation, always fly the airplane and do the rest only when you have time.  (FAA-H-8083-25)
